topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Block Storage Overview

section.title: About Block Storage
section.p: The HP Helion OpenStack Block Storage Volume Operations uses the OpenStack Cinder (Block Storage) service to manage storage volumes, including creating volumes, creating volume snapshots, and configuring volumes.
Once created, you can easily disconnect block storage volumes from one instance and attach them to another. You can also create snapshots of these volumes.
Helion OpenStack 2.0 supports the following storage backends for Block Storage Volumes and Backup Datastore Configuration:

ul.li:
Volumes
VSA
3PAR FC or iSCSI
VMDK
Ceph
